description: Developed REST APIs using .NET, C#, Jenkins, and Clojure for digital investigation analysis and automated job processing
Enhanced the workflow builder using React, Redux and contributed to the migration from Clojure to .NET backend
Implemented latest testing standards in React@18, Jest, Cypress and led the migration from Enzyme to RTL
Assisted in Keycloak integration to facilitate the separation of User Service and enable OIDC authentication using JWTs
Contributed to velocity enablement by reducing technical debt, addressing build failures, and customer support requests
Implemented accessibility standards in the Workforce Management system, adhering to W3C guidelines
Incorporated timezone support into the employee work planner and synchronized it with the visual graphs
Integrated web components into the codebase and improved frontend using Typescript, jQuery, and KnockoutJS
Developed a WordPress website and managed the Content Management System and hosting services
Implemented SEO strategies including blog writing and social media marketing, generating 20% extra leads
